answers.answer: Hello, are you in the menopausal/perimenopausal period? If so then the symptoms could be due to hormonal imbalances. Besides yeast, other infections of the vagina are bacterial vaginosis, trichomonasvaginalis and herpes vaginalis. This can also cause the burning sensation. The other causes for your symptoms could be metabolic disorders like diabetes, which  can be detected by a simple blood test.  You can discuss this with your primary care physician when you happen to meet him next time. Regards.

question: I've had a burning sensation and it won't go away. I went to the doctor and got checked for std and yeast everything came back negative. What could this be?
title: Unplesant sensatoin
